oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - No. 4955
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show No. 4955, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold, the Oklahoma Wranglers, Roy Wiggins, and host Vince Harding. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'. Earliest possible record date is 1949, possibly early 1950s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Oklahoma Wranglers; Roy Wiggins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Vince Harding) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Rose Of Old Pawnee (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Mexicali Rose (Eddy Arnold) -- Vince Harding and Eddy Arnold introduce the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Wait For The Wagon (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Draggin' The Bow (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Vince Harding and Eddy Arnold talk -- Show Me The Way Back To Your Heart (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Wiggins, Roy; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Willis, Guy, 1915-1981; Willis, Skeeter, -1976
